data: First, figure out how to move, the gravity is unusual here
Go to the tree on the right
We have a slime that will collect logs
Keep chopping, we're going to need a lot of wood
Great! That's enough to earn you your first money. Keep going forward and find the "Village" sign
I found this village to be very friendly.
Here we can sell and buy everything we need
First meet the merchant and sell him all the logs (he's wearing a blue shirt)
Congratulations on your first earnings
Now shake hands with the blacksmith and buy a couple of shovels from him
To return to the forest, you can not run to the sign, but simply teleport
To the left of the trees is an area of very loose soil. Dig a quarry there to build a cruiser
To switch to the shovel, click here
Great, the blocks that can be dug up are marked with white lines
Well, it looks like we need more shovels...
Let's see what we need to build
Yeah...
We need to get metal somewhere. My radars show suspicious activity in the tunnel on the right
Dig!
This is a miner, he sells metals cheaper than merchants, so we will take them from him
Now find more coins to start buying up metals and trade them for other stuff
I forgot to tell you something! The ship needs fuel. You can only buy it from that sleazy guy in the village
We'll have to go into the dark forest... A sign to the right of the village
He's kind of a coward, so we'll have to go by ourselves. There are zombies running around, don't forget to buy weapon
